name: Delatrune Sans Fight
description:
Sezuire Warning

Hi

This is a Sans fight with the Deltarune battle system.
Once you finished the genocide run Chara didn't take your soul.
So you are in a pacifist run to make things right but Sans stops you because he remembered
what you did. Chara decides to take your soul but you haven't killed anyone 
so Chara is waiting for you to kill Sans to then take your soul.

Thank you and please support me.

Follow me on Twitter: @FantasyRuinX
